name: Deluxe Mashed Potatoes
author: Rita Koeppel

ingredients.name: Instant potato mix and ingredients needed for serving of 12

instructions: Prepare instant potatoes as directed on box for 12. Mix cream cheese and sour cream into potatoes. Put in 9 x 13 pan and sprinkle top with paprika. Can drizzle a little melted butter on top. Bake at 375Â° for 45-60 minutes. May also be seasoned with garlic salt and parsley if desired. Dish may be prepared early and stored in refrigerator.
